headline.main: BABY' CARRIER SUNK IN MAKIN INVASION; Loss of Life Feared Heavy on Escort Ship -- Submarine Wahoo Reported Missing

lead_paragraph: ABOARD TRANSPORT OFF MAKIN, Gilbert Islands, Nov. 24 (Delayed) -- A Japanese submarine got through our guard before dawn this morning and sank the escort carrier Liscome Bay.
abstract: Navy Dept repts US escort carrier Liscome Bay sunk by Jap submarine, Makin invasion
snippet: ABOARD TRANSPORT OFF MAKIN, Gilbert Islands, Nov. 24 (Delayed) -- A Japanese submarine got through our guard before dawn this morning and sank the escort carrier Liscome Bay....

byline.original: By Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
